metadata.title: USN-3947-1 -- Libxslt vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Libxslt incorrectly handled certain documents. An attacker could possibly use this issue to access sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3947-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-libxslt1 - 1.1.29-5ubuntu0.1 libxslt1-dev - 1.1.29-5ubuntu0.1 libxslt1.1 - 1.1.29-5ubuntu0.1 xsltproc - 1.1.29-5ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
